name: 3 Days Pain
description:
Jump around and avoid icicles in this very short platformer!

[Controls]

WASD to move (sorry, arrow key users!)

F does something neat

The game was made for the "GDevelop 5 Jam: 3 Days and 3 Levels" game jam

Music credits: @LapisTheWolf on Twitter

Everything else: Me of course (check out my Twitter account lol)
